media:group.media:title: SIMUN 2023 - Chapter 4 - Day 3
media:group.media:description: Day 3 of SIMUN concluded with a memorable closing ceremony, at The Indian Public School Coimbatore, blessed with the gracious presence of Ms. Vanathi Srinivasan, a notable lawyer and politician who is serving as Member of Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly from Coimbatore South Constituency. The commendable delegates received awards titled Best Delegation, High Commendation and Special Mention. SIMUN Chapter IV was indeed an amazing accomplishment among the South Indian school circuit, especially after a gap of two years of the pandemic. SIMUN truly aims at providing a platform to nourish the young minds to view the world problems through a refined humanitarian lens and encouraged the participants to be responsible global citizens of tomorrow. Retaining the aspects that made SIMUN a well-regarded MUN, it will continue expanding its reaches upward and outward to make it the epitome of a real MUN experience.

media:group.media:title: SIMUN 2023 - Chapter 4 - Day 2
media:group.media:description:
The second day of SIMUN, auspiciously placed on both Vishu and the universal day of culture, commenced with a few words of wisdom from our guest speaker, Mr. J. Premanand. Inaugurating the event with a beautifully performed prayer song, the guest speaker was briefly introduced to the audience. Mr. J. Premanand is the current Commissioner of income tax (OSD), International Taxtation, Chennai. The wise words shared by our chief guest had definitely created an impact on our students, leaving them smarter and wise thoughts.
#SIMUN2023 #SIMUN #MUN #TIPS #theindianpublicschool #TIPSCoimbatore

media:group.media:title: SIMUN 2023 - Chapter 4 - Day 1
media:group.media:description: The much awaited South Indian Model United Nations (SIMUN) Chapter IV, was hosted at TIPS Coimbatore on the 14th - 16th of April. The conference was inaugurated by Tr. V Balakrishnan IPS, IGP/Commissioner of Police, Coimbatore City, the chief guest for the inaugural ceremony. The chief guest was felicitated by the Guest of Honour, Mr. Ashok Kumar, Chairman and Managing Director of The Indian Public School. The event was presided over by the Secretary General, Miss. Prasheetha S and her team of SIMUN. SIMUN 2023 hosts 24 UN committees, making it one of the biggest conference in South India and the only conference that hosts the most numbers of committees in India. . . . #SIMUN #SimunDay1 #TIPS #theindianpublicschool #MUN #ModelUnitedNations #TIPSCoimbatore

entry.title: SIMUN Registration Tutorial | Step-By-Step Instructions | SIMUN Chapter IV

media:group.media:title: SIMUN Registration Tutorial | Step-By-Step Instructions | SIMUN Chapter IV
media:group.media:description:
Are you ready to join the SIMUN saga and make your voice heard? In this step-by-step video, we will guide you through the process of registering for SIMUN Chapter IV, so you don't miss out on the biggest MUN event of the year.
With our easy-to-follow instructions, you will be able to navigate our website with ease and complete your registration form in no time. Learn how to select your preferred country or organization, choose your committee preferences, and make your payment securely online.
Our registration process is straightforward and user-friendly, designed to make your experience as seamless as possible. Don't miss out on the opportunity to meet like-minded individuals, engage in debate and discussion on global issues, and expand your global perspective.
Visit https://simunglobal.org/ to learn more about SIMUN Chapter IV and complete your registration today. Join us on this journey towards global cooperation and harmony.
Questions? Email us at simun@tipsglobal.net Or give us a call at +91 75986 29802

entry.title: SIMUN Chapter IV | We're Back! | South Indian Model United Nations 2023 | [Promo Video]

media:group.media:title: SIMUN Chapter IV | We're Back! | South Indian Model United Nations 2023 | [Promo Video]
media:group.media:description:
Prepare yourself for the biggest event of the year - SIMUN is back! Get ready to witness the epic continuation of the SIMUN saga with SIMUN Chapter IV, coming your way on April 14th to 16th.
Experience the thrill of South Indian Model United Nations as it provides a platform for students to interact and enrich their global perspective through public speaking. Our institution believes in global cooperation and harmony, where every voice is heard and given equal representation to establish our objectives.
Join us on our journey towards achieving global peace and unity. Don't miss this opportunity to be a part of SIMUN 2023 and witness the best minds from across southern states come together to debate and deliberate on global issues.
Mark your calendars and visit our website https://simunglobal.org/ to know more about the event, registration details, and more. Get ready for the ultimate MUN experience with SIMUN 2023!
